entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
